00041 #ifndef _xmlstylesheetreference_h
00042 #define _xmlstylesheetreference_h
00043 
00044 #include "crossplatformexport.h"
00045 #include "xmlnode.h"
00046 
00047 namespace ticpp
00048 {
00049     class StylesheetReference;
00050 }
00051 
00052 namespace phys
00053 {
00054     namespace xml
00055     {
00056         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057         /// @class StylesheetReference
00058         /// @headerfile xmlstylesheetreference.h
00059         /// @brief This is a container of nodes and elements and other XML stuff
00060         /// @details
00061         class PHYS_LIB StylesheetReference: public Node
00062         {
00063             protected:
00064                 /// @brief Construct a StylesheetReference using meta data from a TiCPP pointer
00065                 /// @param Meta A pointer to a ticpp::StylesheetReference that this class will wrap.
00066                 /// @param FirstTimeUsed Set this to true if you are instantiating this for the first time, false if Meta is used in another phys::xml::someclass
00067                 StylesheetReference (ticpp::StylesheetReference* Meta, bool FirstTimeUsed = false);
00068 
00069             public:
00070 
00071                 /// @internal
00072                 /// @brief This will find or create a pointer to the StylesheetReference
00073                 /// @param Meta A pointer to a ticpp::StylesheetReference that returned Attribute will wrap
00074                 /// @return A pointer to the phys::xml::StylesheetReference that wraps Meta
00075                 static StylesheetReference* GetPointerFromWrapped(ticpp::StylesheetReference* Meta);
00076 
00077                 /// @brief Descriptive constructor
00078                 /// @param RefType The Type of the reference (script, Stylesheet etc...)
00079                 /// @param Href The URL of the referenced document
00080                 StylesheetReference (const String& RefType, const String& Href);
00081 
00082                 /// @brief Default Constructor
00083                 /// @details creates an empty StylesheetReference
00084                 StylesheetReference();
00085 
00086                 /// @brief This identifies what kind of child of xml::base this is
00087                 /// @return This returns Base::isStylesheetReference
00088                 virtual Base::XMLComponentType GetType() const;
00089 
00090                 /// @brief Stream XML data into a phys::xml hierearchy
00091                 /// @param In This is the stream the data comes from when you use the >> operator
00092                 /// @return This returns a stream containing all the data that was streamed in, to allow for chaining >> calls
00093                 /// @details Inherited from phys::xml::Node
00094                 virtual std::istream& operator>> (std::istream &In);
00095 
00096                 /// @brief Stream XML data out of a phys::xml hierearchy
00097                 /// @param Out This is the stream the data goes to from when you use the << operator
00098                 /// @return This returns a stream containing all the data that was streamed out, to allow for chaining << calls and retrieval of the data
00099                 /// @details Inherited from phys::xml::Node
00100                 virtual std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream &Out);
00101 
00102                 /// @brief Get the Type of the Reference
00103                 /// @return a phys::String that contains the type information
00104                 String GetRefType() const;
00105 
00106                 /// @brief Get the Href Text
00107                 /// @return a phys::String that contains the Href
00108                 String GetHref() const;
00109 
00110         }; // /StylesheetReference
00111     }// /xml
00112 }// /phys
00113 
00114 #endif
